\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	& \bullet & \bullet \\
	{\,} & \bullet & \bullet & {\,}
	\arrow[two heads, from=1-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[tail, from=1-2, to=2-2]
	\arrow[tail, from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow["\simeq"{description}, dashed, from=2-2, to=1-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=2-2, to=2-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
